Halco Mining bụ ụlọ ọrụ aluminum nke dị na Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania (USA)
A haziri ụlọ ọrụ ahụ n'okpuru iwu nke steeti Delaware na United States
Halco bụ onye nwe pasenti iri ise na otu nke ngwaahịa nke Compagnie des Bauxites de Guinée, isi aluminum mine na smelter na Guinea, nke a maara dị ka CBG.

Ụlọ ọrụ Harvey Aluminium Company guzobere njikọ ahụ na 1962 iji gwuo ego bauxite na mpaghara Boké. Halco/CBG nwere ikike nke mine bauxite na mpaghara 10,000 square kilomita nke ugwu ọdịda anyanwụ Guinea n'okpuru mgbazinye afọ iri asaa na ise ruo n'afọ 2038..
